## Connect to Database

```{r ConnectToDatabase, eval = T, warning = F}
library(RMySQL)

host <- "sql9.freemysqlhosting.net"
username <- "sql9627574"
password <- "mYWRf2SMq2"
dbname <- "sql9627574"

dbcon <- dbConnect(
  MySQL(),
  user = username,
  password = password,
  dbname = dbname,
  host = host
)
```

## Create Database

```{sql CreateDatabase, connection=dbcon}

```

## Disconnect From Database

```{r}
dbDisconnect(dbcon)
```
